item.title: Metrics for Object Detection
item.description: Different competitions, different metrics PASCAL VOC Challenge COCO Detection Challenge Google Open Images Dataset V4 Competition ImageNet Object Localization Challenge Important definitions Intersection Over Union (IOU) True Positive, False Positive, False Negative and True Negative Precision Recall Metrics Precision x Recall curve Average Precision
